summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Animal Control; defining exotic animals; prohibiting the display of certain exotic animals at facilities owned or operated by the City of Seattle or on property owned by the City of Seattle; amending Chapter 9.25 of the Seattle Municipal Code in connection therewith; and submitting a proposition to the qualified electros of the City of Seattle for their ratification or rejection.
note: This bill failed to be introduced to the Council due to a lack of a second. Proposed referendum regarding exotic circus animals.
